newsitem.title: INDIA: India's two-wheeler stocks gain on National bourse.
newsitem.headline: India's two-wheeler stocks gain on National bourse.

text.p: Shares of scooter and motorcycle makers TVS Suzuki and Bajaj Auto rose on bids by foreign funds on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) in afternoon trade, brokers said.
"The two-wheeler sector has not shown any gaps in demand and supply and seems a safe bet," one trader said referring to recent reports that Indian truckmakers were facing a slowdown in sales growth.
TVS shares rose 10.60 rupees or 2.8 percent to 388 on the NSE while Bajaj Auto gained 11 rupees or 1.1 percent to 991.
Traders said foreign funds were bidders in both stocks in off-market deals.
